rukus.text: yihi mets’iḥāfi (ke’ālahi lemeẖonu) t’irit’iri yelebetimi፤ leferahiyani merī newi፡፡
lenezīya beruk’u negeri yemīyaminu solatinimi denibuni t’ebik’ewi yemīsegidu keset’enachewimi sīsayi yemīcheru leẖonuti፤
le’inezīyami wede ānite beteweredewina ke’ānite befītimi beteweredewi yemīyaminu bemech’ereshayitumi (‘alemi) inerisu yemīyaregagit’u leẖonuti (merī newi)፡፡
inezīya kegētachewi bememerati layi nachewi፤ inezīyami inesu filagotachewini yagenyu nachewi፡፡
inezīya yekaduti (sewochi) bitasiferarachewimi batasiferarachewimi benerisu layi ikuli newi፤ āyaminumi፡፡
ālahi belibochachewi layi bemesimīyachewimi layi ātimobachewali፤ be‘ayinochachewimi layi meshefenya ālile፤ lenesumi talak’i k’it’ati ālachewi፡፡
